entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #252
entry.content: I’ve been suffering from Viral gastroenteritis since a few days ago. It really makes me fragile and I am barely able to do anything

entry.content: I'll be sure to recommend them to friends.

entry.content: It's not negative in that regard, but just, a lot.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #244
entry.content: I'm not feeling too well. I think I'll call in sick. I'm just a bit exhausted and need some time off to process things. Life has been going fast lately..

entry.content: Although I am in remission for depression, suicidality still happens every so often.

entry.content: Using the correct restroom is scary, when using the incorrect one I feel unsafe and when using the correct one I am afraid to be yelled at..

entry.content: Debating the right of my existence with people makes me feel like this world isn't for me.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #230
entry.content: My throat is really sore, I am sick

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #197
entry.content: Found this iPad in the battery bin at the GP today. Thought it was broken or such as all things in those bins are getting burned. But to my surprise it was still fully functional and without any sort of activation lock. Very interesting find!!

Trying to pick up Next.JS, might be more reliable than smaller projects.

Learning new things is always frustrating because you try to do something you just can’t do yet

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #186
entry.content: It’s been going better. Still haven’t picked up my Mandarin Chinese studies again which is unfortunate, but I have been working on my German as that’s significantly easier for me as my native tongue shares over 70% of the vocabulary.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #185
entry.content: Dysphoria and dysmorphia hitting hard lately.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #184
entry.content: Life’s routine is picked up again. Other than my current living situation im doing fine

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #183
entry.content: I’m starting to feel happier I think in general.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #181
entry.content: To whoever is celebrating it, happy Mother’s Day!

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #180
entry.content: Watching EuroVision, 12 points to Belgium in my opinion!!

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #179
entry.content:
I used to know a kid back in highschool, he got from a rough place and managed to leave highschool early to pursue his career in music and beat making. Years ago when I last saw him he decided to chat with me about life and such and showed that he’ll be travelling outside the country to work for a label or something and was proud of his gym progress getting jacked.

I sometimes wonder what happened to him, we never exchanged phone numbers nor were we really considered friends. I hope life is treating him well now and that he made his dreams come true.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #178
entry.content: I didn’t get into too much detail in my article about IPFS about how smart contracts works and such, but I hope to make a revised version.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #177
entry.content: A lot of people in the tech scene seem to be misinformed about “new” technology like cryptography and the impact it could have on the internet as whole once it’s fully ready to be used by the wider market. Web3 mostly gets a bad reputation because people think of the word “crypto” as “cryptocurrency” even though cryptocurrency does not play a role in this at all.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #175
entry.content: I’m wishing everyone a beautiful day today

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #174
entry.content: People at the pharmacy are always so kind

entry.content: I haven’t gotten myself to study Mandarin again… I have been working on my German though.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #172
entry.content: Feeling like passing out every few seconds. It’s probably a protective measure of my body.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #171
entry.content: I’ve been experimenting with sugar waxing and regular wax. Works very well and I even bought a small heater for it. It’s a lot of work though…

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #169
entry.content:
Uh oh, I’ve ran out of medications to regulate my serotonin levels…

Pharmacy is closed until Monday 😭

entry.content: Been feeling down a bit due to my current living situation.

entry.content: I could really use a shower right now

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #163
entry.content: I’ve been working on the yard cleaning 50+ year old walls with pressure washing. Spent a good 4-5 hours on it, now fully covered in dirt and mud but it’s looking very pretty.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #162
entry.content: Got a letter in the mail dr the hospital where they got my name wrong and it was handwritten on the envelope from the Gender Team department of the hospital. Really ironic considering they have my medical documents >_>

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #161
entry.content: Finished running, didn’t run too much, about 7KM maybe? But I am trying to build up my stamina to eventually run over 10KM..

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #160
entry.content: I forgot how exhausting running is.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #158
entry.content: It’s a sunny day outside so I will be running

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #157
entry.content: I hope to talk more here as well. It's nice to look back at my older messages and seeing how my life has changed so far.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #156
entry.content: I also totally forgot to show this!! Currently at 377 days and hope to get to 400.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #155
entry.content: I made some new online friends with a fate similar to mine which is nice!! I've also started picking up my older hobbies again.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #154
entry.content: My brother acknowledged his verbal abuse towards me and my relatives. I already thought it was because of his final exams he wanted to pass, but it’s still nice he himself acknowledges that.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #151
entry.content: Thought my nail-polish fitted my running outfit, but I am colourblind so I might be incorrect.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #150
entry.content: I went running a few days ago, it was fun! I have some pictures.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #149
entry.content: I am also coming more to terms with my identity, which is something I haven't experienced much.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #148
entry.content: The divorce between my parents is also seemingly going more smoothly.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #147
entry.content: Overall, life is getting stabler and more bearable, I really did not expect it all to work out in this way, and I am starting to understand what feeling proud of oneself means.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #146
entry.content:
I hope to go to university soon.

I need some internship hours (mandatory) in order to graduate two years earlier than you're supposed to.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #145
entry.content: College has been going well! Quite glad, made new connections / friends. I like most of my tutors(?) and it's all pretty easy due to my circumstances.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #144
entry.content: But luckily, I am still alive..

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #143
entry.content: I am sorry for not actively posting here. Have been a lot of changes in my life.

entry.content: Sugary water is sticky, it sucked.

entry.content: A few days ago someone threw soda at me while I was biking back home. Very likely because I am not "cis-looking".

entry.content: I apologise for readers

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #121
entry.content:
Because this course is so easy for me, I might be able to do it in two years instead of four, my mentor said.

I hope I can. It’s really easy for me indeed.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #119
entry.content: I gained 2-3 kilos the last year. It’s explanatory due to HRT and overall lack of exercise

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #118
entry.content: Big day today, first school day, I’m anxious

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #117
entry.content: Had my first intake at the gender clinic. It went well but I’m mentally exhausted

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #116
entry.content: They got my name wrong on the student ID. Emailed tech support about it. Hopefully they’ll fix it before Tuesday

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #115
entry.content: I’m officially a student.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #114
entry.content: The teacher at the school I want to study at told me I’m overqualified haha

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #113
entry.content: The world is too cruel. I have been considering giving up.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #112
entry.content: I hate the cistem

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #111
entry.content: Been crying my eyes out for a while

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #109
entry.content: This way of thinking was the default way I thought because I grew up like this. I don’t know any better. And this still haunts me to this day

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #108
entry.content: I’m one of those failures unfortunately.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #107
entry.content: Talked with personal help assistant about how I grew up in an environment that was very toxic now that I think about it. If you didn’t fit in you would be excommunicated by both the parents and the children. You had to get 100/100’s at elementary school else you’d be a failure and you’d never have a future.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #106
entry.content: My package from UPS arrived at the exact time I came home. What a timing!

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #105
entry.content: Good morning everyone, let’s do our best today

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #103
entry.content: My laptop will arrive tomorrow. Hope to make it all work

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #101
entry.content: Waited about 10 months for this eeeee

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #100
entry.content: I can already prepare some papers and other things I have access to, to make the processor easier for me and them.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #99
entry.content: Gender polyclinic called today, I have an appointment for first intake March 4th. It kind of sucks because if my school plans work out I’ll be following lessons March 3rd but still, I am excited. I have to get up really early because it’s far away from where I live.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #96
entry.content: I bought a new laptop, which will be arriving soon. It's for my studies regarding software development. It cost me around 1,5K EUR.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #94
entry.content: My budding breasts are visible through my hoodie, how embarrassing….

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #92
entry.content: I might be getting admitted to a psychiatric hospital. My therapist suggested it. Same for that I might be considered mentally insane.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #91
entry.content: I don’t want to be alive

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #90
entry.content: Police at home again, domestic abuse. It happens too often

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #89
entry.content: I’m an academic failure

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #86
entry.content: Bought a lot of stuff from beauty products to brushes and such. Also working on my education once more.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #85
entry.content: I’m going to give life another chance.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #84
entry.content: I’ve been trying to help others again. As that’s what I suppose I am destined to do.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #83
entry.content: I hope the world will treat people like me gently one day.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #80
entry.content: Thank you for to all my friends for keeping up with me.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #79
entry.content: I wish to write some more things on my blog in the coming weeks. I have some plans to talk about new things.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #78
entry.content: I wish to help others, make them feel safe, like a motherly figure. It's in my nature to help others.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #77
entry.content: I will try to live for others. I have friends who don't want me gone yet.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #76
entry.content:
I apologize for my frequent ramblings. I do not want to come over like this to others.

I have been making plan B's for continuing to live. It's not my top priority as plan A defeats plan B. I love all my friends.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #75
entry.content: As I've stated before, I do not want to reach my birthday. It's of no use, nothing to celebrate other than my misery. I hope to donate my savings and checking balances toward health organisations that might be able to make a change.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #74
entry.content: I know I will disappoint everyone around me for this. But I suppose I'll be selfish this time. Once I am ready, I will say a final goodnight.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #72
entry.content: I have been feeling very depressed lately. It's becoming a problem. Departing without anyone's consent might be the best option. I need to think of a good date when everyone is gone that I can go depart peacefully. I've considered a lot of options; drugs, auto-mutilation, or departing via train. It's all so exhausting.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #70
entry.content: Now it’s time to shower and off to bed

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #69
entry.content: Once again, I really hate needles. But it’s life saving…

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #67
entry.content: I managed to take care of myself today, I’m happy with that. I’ll be heading to bed now. Goodnight kind world.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #66
entry.content: I hope to work on my school and some blog articles the coming days.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #64
entry.content: Going to a hairdresser with my mom soon. I hope to get a nice haircut or such as a haircut makes all the difference. Last time (when I was growing out my hair) the barber messed up and gave me a very masculine cut. I cried my way home and at home itself. This was almost a year ago, I have been too afraid to get a haircut ever since then as it felt like my hair got assaulted. Will send an email to my clinic too. I keep forgetting to do so.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #63
entry.content: I cleaned my room. It frees up your mind.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #61
entry.content: I will be heading to bed, goodnight.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #60
entry.content:
Played a lot of videogames today with a friend. It was fun.

Still feeling really dysphoric on a daily basis. Why must I feel such a way constantly?

I hope to get in contact with my clinic soon. The doctors can fix you, they say.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #58
entry.content:
Goodnight kind and harsh world. I will stay ambivalent about you.

Goodnight to all my friends aswell. And goodnight everyone who have been suffering through the same pain.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #56
entry.content: It's said it is at cisgender woman levels.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #55
entry.content: My blood results came back. My levels are 391 pmol/L

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #48
entry.content: I want to be a butterfly, for you. 🦋✨

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #47
entry.content: Samantha you were right, metamorphosis does take a lot of time. Sometimes turning complex things down to an easier to understand concept such as metamorphosis helps a lot.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #45
entry.content:
Sorry about that, I’m off my meds due to that emergency.

I’ll do my best

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #43
entry.content: Wouldn’t be surprised if my blood test results came back with a 0% change in hormones in my blood.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #42
entry.content: Yes I experience so so called “effects” when it comes to certain body parts. But my hair growth hasn’t decreased one bit and I think it’s just better to depart.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #41
entry.content:
The 5mg/week dosage doesn’t really do anything and reality is starting to hit.

I have tried to write suicide notes before but I never end up going. But am I really that selfish?

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #40
entry.content: Reality is crumbling

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #39
entry.content: Been thinking of moving to Canada when I get the possibility to do so. Perhaps first finish my Compsci studies and find a remote job there.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #38
entry.content: I just realised I haven’t eaten breakfast yet.

entry.content: I did it 😭 aaargh I hate needles

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #35
entry.content: Since I have done my bloodtest, it’s time, once again.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #33
entry.content: Psychiatrist called and he’ll prescribe me my medications again.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #32
entry.content: The pharmacy didn’t receive anything from my psychiatrist. Called my clinic and asked if they could label it as an emergency. I’m currently on half my dosis and don’t have anything for the coming days.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #31
entry.content: Bloodtest done, now going to my pharmacy for an emergency

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #30
entry.content: I think a positive change is to move away from toxicity and negative spaces. Like I did months ago with some image boards with a negative aura.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #29
entry.content: But I want to find happiness.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #28
entry.content: I just feel sorry for taking up space in their mind of worries.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #27
entry.content: My friends are so nice to me.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #26
entry.content: 280 days clean today. I want to make it to 300.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #24
entry.content: People close to me want me to live. I’ll try to keep it up.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #23
entry.content: But I know I’d upset everyone around me for such a selfish act.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #22
entry.content: Contemplating if all my medical issues and psychological issues are really worth even living.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #21
entry.content: Sobered up, working on hygiene.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #19
entry.content: I feel like I’m a bother to everyone.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #18
entry.content: 荷兰语（母语）只有 2300 万人。那并不多。

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #17
entry.content: 我一直在考虑学习中文。 但我不确定它是否比日语容易。

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #15
entry.content:
She feels sorry that I am considering departing to a new life where I am normal.

I just want reincarnation to be real, please.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #14
entry.content: Cried to my mother while talking suicide. I just wish i was real.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #13
entry.content: And steve*, I want you to know this I am really proud of you. Please keep it up.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #11
entry.content: Transgender Healthcare sure has a long way to go. I wish we had informed consent like they have overseas.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #10
entry.content: I’ve been waiting for almost a year 😭

entry.content: Two pictures I took yesterday during my walk:

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #6
entry.content: I also hope to get in contact with my gender polyclinic.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #5
entry.content: I’m currently running low on my medications. I have about one day left of antidepressants before I’ve ran out. Might need to call my psychiatrist / pharmacy for an emergency request. Because without those medications my life will be a living hell.

entry.title: Mikka's happenings 📒 #4
entry.content: It seems to have worked, I now need to revamp the webpage.
